library(rtweet)
auth_setup_default()

rt <- search_tweets('"Smith College"', n = 1000, include_rts = FALSE)
users <- users_data(rt)
in_reply <- lookup_tweets(rt$in_reply_to_status_id)
users_reply <- users_data(in_reply)

useRs <- search_users("#smithies", n = 200)

useRs_twt <- tweets_data(useRs)
